name: find-pkg
description: find the first directory with a package.json, recursing up, starting with the given directory. similar to look-up but does not support globs and only searches for package.json. async and sync.
kwds: find the first directory with a package.json, recursing up, starting with the given directory. similar to look-up but does not support globs and only searches for package.json. async and sync. filepath find findup findup-sync json lookup package package-json pkg resolve sync
